sentences.en: All we can offer you is humble fare.
sentences.cn: 就请你粗茶淡饭凑合一顿.

sentences.en: Andy was a humble, courteous and gentle man.
sentences.cn: 安迪是个谦逊而且彬彬有礼的绅士。

sentences.en: Defeat and failure make people humble.
sentences.cn: 挫折与失败会使人谦卑.

sentences.en: He is a man of humble birth.
He is still the butt of cruel jokes about his humble origins.
sentences.cn: 他仍然因出身低微而被人无情嘲笑。

sentences.en: He is very humble towards his superiors.
He started his career as a humble peanut farmer.
sentences.cn: 他从一个卑微的花生农起家。

sentences.en: His views come from his own humble beginnings.
sentences.cn: 他的观点源于他卑微的出身。

sentences.en: Honda won fame in the 1980s as the little car company that humbled the industry giants.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代，本田作为一家小型汽车公司因一举击垮行业巨头而声名鹊起。

sentences.en: In my humble opinion, he will win the election.
sentences.cn: 依我拙见, 他将在选举中获胜.

sentences.en: Let me take you to my humble abode!
sentences.cn: 让我带你们到鄙人的寒舍去吧!

sentences.en: Now experts are extolling the virtues of the humble potato.
sentences.cn: 现在专家们都在赞美其貌不扬的马铃薯的种种好处。

sentences.en: She was despised because she was of humble origin.
sentences.cn: 她因出身低贱而受到蔑视.

sentences.en: She's contemptuous of my humble home and poor surroundings.
sentences.cn: 她瞧不起我出身卑贱,家境贫困.

sentences.en: There are restaurants, both humble and expensive, that specialize in them.
sentences.cn: 专门做这些菜的餐馆既有毫不起眼的也有价格昂贵的。

sentences.en: We must be humble , for we are compassed by mysteries.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要谦虚, 因为我们周围充满了我们还不理解的事物.

sentences.en: your most humble servant, George Porter.
sentences.cn: 您最卑微的仆人，乔治•波特。

phrases.tran_cn: 低声下气地道歉（接受羞辱）
(古或幽默)您卑微的仆人，卑职 ［用于信件结尾，或作为讽刺性的谦 恭］

trans.tran_cn: 谦逊的，简陋的，（级别或地位）低下的，不大的
trans.tran_en: not considering yourself or your ideas to be as important as other people’s

trans.tran_cn: 使谦恭；轻松打败（尤指强大的对手）；低声下气
trans.tran_en: If you humble someone who is more important or powerful than you, you defeat them easily

trans.tran_cn: 使谦恭，轻松打败（尤指强大的对手），低声下气
trans.tran_en: to show that you are not too proud to ask for something, admit you are wrong etc
